name: Zombie Run
description:
Play as one of three characters - Lily, the girl who drowned. Nata, lost to the flames, or Wolf, who found the beast within.

Hunt the animals. If you find them all, you win.

Use the arrow keys left-right to switch between characters, then any key to select one. After that, you use the arrow keys to control the character.
The game supports gamepad controllers, both using the analog stick or d-pad.

A game by @weisshaupt
Art by Lily
Music by @ozzednet
